ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var a = 'https://anduril.xmkanshu.com/v3/book/get_last_chapter_list?bookid=@get:{book}&page=1&pagesize=100000&lastchapterid=';
var r = [];
for(var i=1;i<50;i++){
    r.push(a + parseInt(i*300));
}
r
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//默认选择源
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.checkKeyWord: 长生志异，开局菜市口被斩首
ruleSearch.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
最近禁止了国内 IP 访问。。因此需要挂代理使用了。
网站外观看着和 69书吧 挺像，但实际网页结构元素什么的不一样，估计是个蹭名字的？不过我找了几本连载的书看了下正文内容倒是基本一样，可能是爬的 69书吧？所以也不必在乎是真是假了，能用就行
另外，该网站默认是繁体的，网页加载完成后会执行 JS 根据浏览器语言转为简体，但书源是需要手动转的，不过我也看了，这网站默认的繁体其实也是直接机器简繁转换的（毕竟这些小说本身都是简体发布的），所以转换回来后就和小说本身内容一样了。

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content##的小说
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: .chapter-table a.0@text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content##\-.*|\_.*|\s.*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: a.1@text##的小说
ruleSearch.lastChapter: .sc-time span.0@text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleSearch.name: a.0@text##\-.*|\_.*|\s.*

ruleToc.chapterName: text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字Kk].*?[】）\)]
